content:
Flowers bloom in the wilderness, adorning this world,
They blossom in my teacup, making my tea party special...
Either way, it's simply delightful.

Once you're done gathering chrysanthemums,
the Camp should be all tidied up too.
Come back soon.

Thanks to Glenn's earlier tidying of the Camp,
we're making progress
faster than expected.

Oh, I heard you're going to collect <color=#97c344>chrysanthemums</color>!
So it's going to be a flower tea party...
Ooh! I can't wait!

This bubble world seems perfect for growing chrysanthemums.
We should try planting different flowers here in the future~

Now,
Let's gather enough for our tea party first.
I'll join you as soon as I finish cleaning up the Camp.
